dsa.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
dsa.description: A step-by-step roadmap to master DSA for coding interviews and competitive programming.

nodes.label: Arrays & Hashing
nodes.description: Foundation of DSA. Learn array operations, hash maps, and hash sets.

nodes.label: Two Pointers
nodes.description: Technique using two indices to scan arrays efficiently.

nodes.label: Stack
nodes.description: LIFO data structure. Used in expression evaluation, backtracking.

nodes.label: Sliding Window
nodes.description: Optimize subarray/substring problems using a moving window.

nodes.label: Linked List
nodes.description: Nodes connected via pointers. Learn traversal, reversal, and cycle detection.

nodes.label: Binary Search
nodes.description: Divide and conquer search. Works on sorted data in O(log n).

nodes.label: Trees
nodes.description: Hierarchical data structure. Master traversal, BST, and balanced trees.

nodes.label: Tries
nodes.description: Prefix tree for efficient string searching and autocomplete.

nodes.label: Heap / Priority Queue
nodes.description: Complete binary tree used for efficient min/max retrieval.

nodes.label: Backtracking
nodes.description: Explore all possibilities recursively and prune invalid paths.

nodes.label: Graphs
nodes.description: BFS, DFS, topological sort, and shortest paths on graphs.

nodes.label: Dynamic Programming 1D
nodes.description: Memoization and tabulation for overlapping subproblems.

nodes.label: Advanced Graphs
nodes.description: Minimum spanning tree, union find, and advanced graph algorithms.

nodes.label: Dynamic Programming 2D
nodes.description: 2D DP for grid problems, string matching, and interval problems.

nodes.label: Greedy
nodes.description: Make locally optimal choices at each step to find global optimum.

nodes.label: Intervals
nodes.description: Merge, insert, and find non-overlapping intervals.

nodes.label: Bit Manipulation
nodes.description: Use bitwise operations for efficient solutions.

nodes.label: Math & Geometry
nodes.description: Mathematical techniques for coding problems.

python.title: Python Developer
python.description: Step-by-step roadmap to become a professional Python developer.

nodes.label: Learn the Basics
nodes.description: Core Python syntax, variables, and control flow.

nodes.label: Data Structures
nodes.description: Python's built-in and custom data structures.

nodes.label: Object Oriented Programming
nodes.description: Classes, inheritance, and design patterns in Python.

nodes.label: Algorithms
nodes.description: Sorting, searching, and recursion implemented in Python.

nodes.label: Advanced Features
nodes.description: Pythonic features that make code elegant and efficient.

nodes.label: Package Managers & Environments
nodes.description: Manage dependencies and virtual environments.

nodes.label: Concurrency
nodes.description: Parallel and async programming in Python.

nodes.label: Learn a Framework
nodes.description: Build real applications using Python web frameworks.

nodes.label: Testing
nodes.description: Write reliable tests for Python applications.

nodes.label: Static Typing
nodes.description: Add type safety to Python code.

nodes.label: DevOps & Deployment
nodes.description: Package, document and deploy Python applications.

webdev.title: Full Stack Web Development
webdev.description: Complete roadmap from HTML basics to full-stack deployment.

nodes.label: HTML & CSS
nodes.description: Building blocks of the web.

nodes.label: JavaScript
nodes.description: The programming language of the web.

nodes.label: Git & GitHub
nodes.description: Version control for collaborative development.

nodes.label: npm / Package Managers
nodes.description: Manage JavaScript packages and dependencies.

nodes.label: React
nodes.description: The most popular frontend library for building UIs.

nodes.label: Tailwind CSS
nodes.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.

nodes.label: Backend Development
nodes.description: Server-side programming for APIs and databases.

nodes.label: TypeScript
nodes.description: Typed superset of JavaScript for large-scale apps.

nodes.label: Node.js
nodes.description: JavaScript runtime for server-side development.

nodes.label: Databases
nodes.description: Store and query data with SQL and NoSQL solutions.

nodes.label: Testing
nodes.description: Ensure code quality with automated tests.

nodes.label: DevOps & Deployment
nodes.description: Ship and scale your applications.
